permissions: Allowed for admins. For broker tenders: users with broker membership for the tender seller. For trucker tenders: users with broker membership for the tender buyer or trucker membership for the tender seller.
side_effects: Updates the tender status from offered to rejected, cancels any unaccepted tender notifications, and for broker tenders creates a broker tender rejection notification to the customer dispatch user.
validation_notes: Tender must be in offered status. --tender is required. When --tender is an ID, --tender-type is required. If --tender uses Type|ID format, --tender-type must be omitted and the format must include a non-empty type and id. Tender IDs are cast to integer by the API.

flags.name: --tender
flags.validation: Accepts either Type|ID or a plain ID. If Type|ID is used, do not also set --tender-type and both parts must be non-empty. Tender IDs are cast to integer by the API.

flags.name: --tender-type
flags.validation: Required when --tender is an ID without a type; must be a tender type such as broker-tenders or customer-tenders.
